function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Perceived lack of usefulness of technology","Impact":"Failure to adopt technology that could improve household environments and reduce the spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Education and awareness campaigns to highlight the benefits of the technology","Technologies":"Smart home energy management systems (HEMS)","People":"Residents, renters","Owner":"Technology providers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Technology anxiety","Impact":"Reluctance to adopt technology that could improve household environments and reduce the spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Providing user-friendly interfaces and technical support, addressing concerns about data privacy and security","Technologies":"Smart home energy management systems (HEMS)","People":"Residents, renters","Owner":"Technology providers, data privacy experts"},{"Description":"Inability of renters to make decisions on home improvements","Impact":"Limitation in implementing technology that could improve household environments and reduce the spread of contagious diseases in rental properties","Mitigation":"Involving landlords and property management in the decision-making process, incentivizing landlords to invest in technology","Technologies":"Smart home energy management systems (HEMS)","People":"Renters, landlords, property management","Owner":"Landlords, property management, technology providers"}]}
